Eric Schmidt was an early backer of Barack Obama and according to NewsMeat, has given more than$ 230,000 in campaign donations to Democrats, compared with less than$ 20,000 to Republicans. There is a political favor to be returned yet, said Roger Kay, George W. Bush of Endpoint Technologies. Eric Schmidt 's fundraising ability would also be a pro for Team Barack Obama , which is going to need big money to finance the 2012 reelection campaign.
